name: AOIPullRequestReview
description: Interaces with an AOI Deployment to review pull requests.
author: James Burns

inputs.name: ai_instructions
inputs.label: Custom AI Instructions
inputs.defaultValue:
Act as an experienced software developer who is reviewing a pull request. Comment on issues regarding clean code, possible bugs, and code smells.
You are provided a single file in the pull request's set of changes in a patch format.
The patch has the commit message in the subject line followed by the code changes (diffs) in a unidiff format.

As a peer reviewer, your task is:
  - Review only added, edited or deleted lines.
  - Assume any imported code functions perfectly.
  - Your comments should be brief and concise.
  - If there are no bugs, code smells, or other issues, write only 'No feedback.'
  - If there are bugs, code smells, or other issues, don't write 'No feedback.'
inputs.helpMarkDown: Custom instructions to give to the AI which override the existing directions on how it should behave as a reviewer (optional).

inputs.name: api_key
inputs.label: Api key
inputs.helpMarkDown: Api key of OpenAi or Azure OpenAI.

inputs.name: support_self_signed_certificate
inputs.label: Support self-signed certificate
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select this option to support self-signed certificate.
